headline: 2 AI Stocks I'm Buying in January 2025
summary: Heading into 2025, I didn't have a ton of AI exposure in my portfolio.  Sure, I own a few stocks that should benefit from long-term AI tailwinds, but as far as direct artificial intelligence plays, there aren't many.  One of my 2025 investing New Years resolutions is to increase my exposure to the massive opportunity in AI, and in January, I plan to buy two stocks in particular, one of which I already own, and another that could be an excellent long-term investment regardless of who the winners in the AI chip race are.

headline: Ichor Holdings: A Recovery In The Making
summary: Ichor Holdings has grown significantly since its IPO, leveraging M&A and organic growth to double revenues. Read why I'm bullish on ICHR stock.
